text: Mgbe Ehaz,7:1 Nʼime senchuri nke asaa, tupu a mụọ Kraịst, ndị Izrel na Siria jikọrọ aka buso ndị Asịrịa agha. Nʼoge ahụ ha gbalịrị ịkwagide Ehaz, eze Juda, ka o soro ha ga buo agha ahụ. nwa Jotam, nwa nwa Ụzaya bụ eze na Juda, Rezin eze Aram, na Peka eze Izrel, nwa Remalaya, busoro Jerusalem agha. Ma ha emerighị ya; obodo ahụ guzosiri ike.
